member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Twitter.TwitterOptions.RetrieveUserDetails
member.summary: Enables the retrieval user details during the authentication process, including e-mail addresses. Retrieving e-mail addresses requires special permissions from Twitter Support on a per application basis. The default is false. See https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/get/account/verify_credentials
